text: hananimkkeseo guleum-eul dusa geu geos-eul heuleugehago geugeos-eul dasi mo a biguleum-eulo mandeul-eo geu sailo bileul naelige hasim-eul geudaeneun boji moshaessneunyo geubunkkeseoneun ubag-eul dam-eunsangwa gat-eun guleum-eul haneul-eseo naeli ge hasieo geubunkkeseo wonhaneun jaleul myeolmangke hasigo geubunkkeseo wonhaneun jaleul bohohagido hasimyeo beongaeui seomgwang-euloneun silyeog-eul as-agagido hasinila
